Package polimi.ingsoft.server.controller

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsoft.server.controller.GameState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class GameState extends Object implements Serializable, Cloneable
This class manages the state of the game, including the FSMs of the game
See Also:

    • GameState

      public GameState(MatchController matchController, Integer requestedNumPlayers)
      Constructs a GameState with the specified matchController and number of players.
      Parameters:
      matchController - the match controller associated with this game state
      requestedNumPlayers - the number of players requested for the game

    • validateMove

      public void validateMove(Player player, TURN_STEP move) throws WrongPlayerForCurrentTurnException, WrongStepException, WrongGamePhaseException, MatchBlockedException
      Validates a player's move
      Parameters:
      player - the player making the move
      move - the move to validate
      Throws:
      WrongPlayerForCurrentTurnException - if the player is not the current player
      WrongStepException - if the move is not allowed in the current step
      WrongGamePhaseException - if the move is not allowed in the current game phase
      MatchBlockedException - if the match is blocked

    • validateInitialChoice

      public void validateInitialChoice(String player, GAME_PHASE phase, INITIAL_STEP step) throws WrongGamePhaseException, WrongStepException, InitalChoiceAlreadySetException
      Validates a player's initial choice
      Parameters:
      player - the player making the move
      phase - the game phase
      step - the initial step
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - if the game phase is not correct
      WrongStepException - if the step is not correct
      InitalChoiceAlreadySetException - if the initial choice has already been set

    • checkColorAvailability

      public void checkColorAvailability(PlayerColor color) throws ColorAlreadyPickedException
      Checks if a color has already been picked by another player.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to check
      Throws:
      ColorAlreadyPickedException - if the color is already picked

    • goToNextPlayer

      public void goToNextPlayer()
      Advances to the next player.

    • setOnlyWinner

      public void setOnlyWinner()
      Sets the only winner of the game. Called if only one player is remained in the game(after the timer is expired)
